Title: Relates to a rebate for residents of Kings county who frequently commute across the Verrazzano-Narrows bridge
Summary: Relates to a rebate for residents of Kings county who commute across the Verrazzano-Narrows bridge more than ten times per month while using a New York customer service E-ZPass account.
LawCode: Add ยง553-1, Pub Auth L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public authorities law, in relation to a rebate for residents of Kings county who frequently commute across the Verrazzano-Narrows bridge
